physical_examinations.relevant_findings: Cervical lymph node swelling detected on follow-up ultrasonographic examination, focal increased 18F-FDG uptake around the supraclavicular region, increased 18F-FDG uptakes in bilateral supraclavicular lymph nodes, cervical esophagus, and cervical paraesophageal lymph node swelling, enhanced wall thickening of the cervical esophagus.
